biotools.summary: The database of Allelic Dosage-corrected Allele-Specific human Transcription factor binding sites provides a genomic map of allele-specific binding at hundreds thousands single-nucleotide polymorphisms constructed by meta-analysis of thousands of ChIP-Seq experiments.

bioschemas.name: ADASTRA
bioschemas.summary: The database of Allelic Dosage-corrected Allele-Specific human Transcription factor binding sites provides a genomic map of allele-specific binding at hundreds thousands single-nucleotide polymorphisms constructed by meta-analysis of thousands of ChIP-Seq experiments.
